content: CFS-S SIL SL Firestop silicone sealant Silicone-based sealant providing maximum movement in fire-rated joints and pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Smoke-, gas- and water-resistant Designed to adhere well without primer Applications Construction and expansion joints joints in fire compartment floors Multiple penetrations in small or large openings in fire compartment floors For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 38 g/l Base materials: Concrete, Masonry, Metal Application temperature range: 35 - 104 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 38 g/l | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Metal | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Can be painted | No | Product Class | Ultimate | Color | Grey ### ITEMS- 2076884 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL SL foil grey - Package Size 15 pc - 3506114 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL SL 600ml foil 3 cases - Package Size 1 pc - 3506115 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL SL 600ml foil 4 cases + disp - Package Size 1 pc - 2076885 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL SL pail grey - Package Size 1 pc - 3506116 - FS sealant CFS-S SIL SL 5 gal 18 pails - Package Size 1 pc
